english.segment1: I just ran into a few someones today. Someones that I never really knew. And I used to think how I had them all so figured out
english.segment2: But no, none of it's true cuz I never knew you. and now the truth of it is, is I wanna be like you. So hello, good friend, I wanna be next to you. For my head for my heart for its true
english.segment3: So I'm burning the thoughts of the things that I once said. Because you tore down the walls that the world that has put inside my head. And I just get of sick of things that we think, we think we know
english.segment4: And no, none of it's true cuz I never knew you. and now the truth of it is, is I wanna be like you. So hello, good friend, I wanna be next to you. For my head for my heart for its true
english.segment5: So take me and save me and change me and then make me. And embrace me and then brave my heart for you. No, No, cuz I can't go on without you. And it's time for something never knowing, oh
english.segment6: And no, none of it's true cuz I never knew you. and now the truth of it is, is I wanna be like you. So hello, good friend, I wanna be next to you. For my head for my heart for its true
english.segment7: And as they as strolled along. My heart broke out in song. From all the things and the thoughts and assumptions that I had wrong. See now I'll be on my way to make this claim. I'll make it famous in everyway. I'll make it stay when I will save it..
english.segment8: No, none of it's true cuz I never knew you. and now the truth of it is, is I wanna be like you. So hello, good friend, I wanna be next to you. For my head for my heart for its true [x3].
